original_text: He must not use yeast if he cooks his cake on a flat plate. He must make it with flour and oil.
korean_text: 철판에 부친 것으로 소제의 예물을 드리려거든 고운 가루에 누룩을 넣지 말고 기름을 섞어

sentences.original_text: if he cooks his cake on a flat plate
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 평평한 접시에 그의 떡을 굽는다면

sentences.original_text: He must make it with flour
